column4: how do i know if my laptop can handle beryl and if so where do i go to get it?
so im assuming 7.10 comes with compiz fusion? if so how do i get the cube desktop operating
What kind of graphics card do you have?
thats the thing i cant find out, im using a presario laptop
ok, when you go to system -->preferences--> appearance, have you set advanced effects, and did it allow you do so?
pf/wstp sorry im a noob, how exactly do i install that, i dont see it under add/remove applications
then type ccsm to run the configuration program
you'll need to check 'enable cube' and 'rotate cube'
I take it your windows are wobbly
do the compizconfig-settings-manager install and you'll have that sucker spinning in no time
okay i did the sudo apt get deal, what do i type in terminal now?
i did that it came up with a bunch of crap...now what? sorry for noobism haha
